info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 12:47PM CDT until August 07 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN KANKAKEE...NORTHERN NEWTON AND SOUTHERN LAKE COUNTIES... At 1247 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lowell, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lowell, Lake Village, Roselawn, Lake Dalecarlia, Shelby, Schneider, Sumava Resorts and Thayer. Including the following interstate... Indiana I-65 between mile markers 233 and 243. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
